boil up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if a situation or emotion boils up, bad feelings grow until they reach a dangerous level
boil up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She could sense that trouble was boiling up at work.
He could feel the anger boiling up inside him.
boil up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to heat food or a liquid until it begins to boil
boil up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Boil the fruit up with sugar.
